meanings.definition: The process of combining two identical molecules to form a dimer.
meanings.sent1: The dimerization of the molecules resulted in a stronger compound.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the dimerization of the chemicals in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The dimerization of the ingredients in the recipe made it taste twice as good.
meanings.sent4: The dimerization of ideas can lead to innovative solutions.
meanings.sent5: The dimerization of colors created a beautiful new shade.

meanings.definition: The act of forming a dimer by linking two identical molecules together.
meanings.sent1: Proteins undergo dimerization to perform specific functions in the body.
meanings.sent2: The dimerization of the elements was crucial for the reaction to occur.
meanings.sent3: The dimerization of the puzzle pieces made it easier to solve.
meanings.sent4: In nature, dimerization plays a key role in various biological processes.
meanings.sent5: The dimerization of the keys unlocked the hidden door.
